SEARCH
Package com.vs.starnet.star.network

Class HttpHandler

java.lang.Object
com.vs.starnet.star.network.HttpHandler
public class HttpHandler extends Object
Utility class for HTTP-based communication using Java 11+ HttpClient. This class provides methods to send HTTP requests (POST, GET, DELETE, PATCH) and build JSON payloads for HTTP communication. It also handles logging of requests and responses.

  • Method Details

    • buildComponentPayload

      public static String buildComponentPayload(Component component) throws Exception
      Builds the component payload as a JSON string using the Jackson library. This method serializes a Component object into a JSON string for use in HTTP requests.
      Parameters:
      component - The component data to include in the payload.
      Returns:
      The JSON string representing the component.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any required fields in the component are missing or invalid.
      Exception

    • buildMessagePayload

      public static String buildMessagePayload(Message message) throws Exception
      Builds the message payload as a JSON string using the Jackson library. This method serializes a Message object into a JSON string for use in HTTP requests.
      Parameters:
      message - The message data to include in the payload.
      Returns:
      The JSON string representing the message.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the message object cannot be serialized to JSON.

    • buildSolPayload

      public static String buildSolPayload(Sol sol) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • sendPostRequest

      public static HttpResponse<String> sendPostRequest(String urlString, String jsonPayload, String contentType) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Sends a POST request with dynamic content type to a specified URL. This method is a wrapper for the generic sendRequest(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.vs.starnet.star.network.HttpHandler.HttpMethodType, java.lang.String) method using POST as the HTTP method.
      Parameters:
      urlString - The URL to send the POST request to.
      jsonPayload - The JSON payload to send.
      contentType - The Content-Type for the request (e.g., "application/json").
      Returns:
      The server response as a string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the request.
      InterruptedException - If the request is interrupted.

    • sendGetRequest

      public static HttpResponse<String> sendGetRequest(String urlString) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Sends a GET request to a specified URL. This method is a wrapper for the generic sendRequest(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.vs.starnet.star.network.HttpHandler.HttpMethodType, java.lang.String) method using GET as the HTTP method.
      Parameters:
      urlString - The URL to send the GET request to.
      Returns:
      The server response as a string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the request.
      InterruptedException - If the request is interrupted.
